mapper.sql: id, menu_name, pid, `order`, `path`, component, is_frame, menu_type, perms, create_time, update_time, user_id, icon, visible, `status`
mapper.select: select sm.perms from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = sm.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = srm.role_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id WHERE sur.user_id = #{id}

SELECT distinct sm.id,sm.menu_name,sm.pid,sm.order,sm.path,sm.component,sm.is_frame,sm.menu_type, sm.icon,sm.visible,sm.status FROM sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.id = srm.menu_id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = srm.role_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id where sur.user_id = #{id}

select sm.id,sm.menu_name,sm.pid,sm.order,sm.path,sm.component, sm.is_frame,sm.perms,sm.create_time,sm.user_id,sm.icon,sm.visible, sm.status from sys_menu sm left join sys_user su on su.id = sm.user_id
and sm.menu_name like concat('%',#{menuName},'%')
